verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:12
verses.text: The eleventh to Eliashib, the twelfth to Jakim,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:13
verses.text: The thirteenth to Huppah, the fourteenth to Jeshebeab,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:14
verses.text: The fifteenth to Bilgah, the sixteenth to Immer,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:15
verses.text: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:16
verses.text: The nineteenth to Pethahiah, the twentieth to Jehezekel,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:17
verses.text: The one and twentieth to Jachin, the two and twentieth to Gamul,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:18
verses.text: The three and twentieth to Delaiah, the four and twentieth to Maaziah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 24:19
verses.text: These were the orderings of them in their service to come into the house of the Lord, according to their manner, under Aaron their father, as the Lord God of Israel had commanded him.
